title: Christmas Betrothals: Mistletoe Magic / The Winter Queen
description: Marriage is a very serious affair for these Lords and Ladies! This title contains two stories that include "Mistletoe Magic" and "The Winter Queen". "Mistletoe Magic" by Sophia James - Could she be betrothed by Christmas? Miss Lillian Davenport must marry sensibly, although she yearns for some excitement first. Lucas Morgan is wild, dangerous and tempting. If she offers to pay for his silence, can she buy a single, passionate kiss? "The Winter Queen" by Amanda McCabe - Innocent Lady Rosamund is sent to serve at the infamous Elizabethan Court. But she is unprepared to meet the likes of Anton Gustavson - a favourite of the Queen. Dark, brooding and mysterious Anton is drawn to Rosamund's ethereal beauty, but his secrets make falling in love far too dangerous!
author: Sophia James
